dict.string: This app needs access to your camera to allow you to take photos and videos for creating content, scanning documents, or capturing moments. Your photos and videos will only be used for the features you choose to use within the app.

This app needs access to your location to provide location-based services, such as finding nearby content, location-specific features, or improving your experience with relevant local information. Your location is only accessed when you actively use location-based features.

This app needs access to your microphone to enable voice recording, audio messages, voice commands, and other audio-related features. Audio recordings will only be captured when you actively use audio features and will be processed according to our privacy policy.

This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload photos and videos from your device. This enables you to share content, create posts, or use images in various app features. We only access photos you specifically choose to share.

This app needs permission to save photos and videos to your photo library. This allows you to save content you create or download within the app to your device's photo gallery for easy access and sharing.

This app uses Face ID (or Touch ID) to securely authenticate your identity and provide quick, secure access to your account. This helps protect your personal information and provides a convenient login experience.

This app needs access to Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices, share content, or enable proximity-based features. Bluetooth is used to enhance your experience with device connectivity and content sharing.

This app may access your local network to discover nearby devices, enable local content sharing, or provide network-based features. This helps you connect with devices on your local network for enhanced functionality.

This app may request access to your health data to provide health-related features, track wellness metrics, or integrate with your health and fitness goals. We only access health data you explicitly choose to share.

This app may update your health data to record activities, track progress, or sync information with your health profile. We only update health data with your explicit permission and for features you choose to use.

This app may access motion and fitness data to provide activity tracking, gesture controls, or fitness-related features. This helps enhance your experience with motion-based interactions and health monitoring.
This app may use speech recognition to enable voice commands, voice-to-text features, or hands-free operation. This provides convenient voice-based interaction with the app's features.
This app integrates with Siri to enable voice commands and hands-free operation. This allows you to use Siri to control app features and access content through voice commands.
This app may access your calendar to schedule events, set reminders, or sync with your existing calendar. This helps you manage your schedule and integrate app activities with your daily planning.

This app may access your contacts to help you connect with friends, share content, or find people you know. We only access contacts you choose to share and use this information to enhance your social experience.
This app may access your reminders to help you set and manage tasks, create to-do lists, or integrate with your existing reminder system. This helps you stay organized and track your activities.
This app may access your Apple Music library to provide music-related features, create playlists, or enhance your audio experience. We only access music data you choose to share.
This app may access your media library to provide music and video features, create playlists, or enhance your entertainment experience. We only access media you choose to share.
